item.title: August 2024 is a Big Month For LEGO Fans
item.description:
Highlights

  • LEGO has expanded beyond toys into video games, with a new Humble Bundle in August 2024 offering 18 LEGO games at a low price.
  • PlayStation Plus subscribers get LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga free in August, while new LEGO sets for major lines are also released.
  • LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga features detailed settings and a wide array of playable characters, appealing to Star Wars fans. With this game and the Humble Bundle on offer next month, fans have a lot to look forward to.

Originally hitting store shelves in 1949, LEGO has come a very long way in the last 75 years, growing far beyond the company's original goals. In 2024, LEGO stands as one of the biggest toy manufacturers in the world, with its vast range of construction sets now covering a wide variety of original and licensed themes, encompassing major brands like Star Wars , Marvel, DC, and Super Mario .

But while its never-ending stream of real-world sets is by far LEGO's most consistent money-maker, it isn't the only product the company makes. Over the last few decades, LEGO has put plenty of resources into developing its own array of family-friendly video games, many of which have adapted beloved movie franchises. In producing these games alongside its sets, LEGO has continued to capture new fans, and those fans have a lot to look forward to this August.

August 2024 Is a Huge Month for LEGO Fans

August 2024's Humble Bundle is a LEGO Fan's Dream

For those unaware, Humble Bundle is a digital PC storefront best known for selling its titular packages. These bundles contain a handful of games, and consumers are given the option to pay as much as they want for them, with a portion of the proceeds going to a specific charity. LEGO has appeared quite a few times in Humble Bundle's history, but never quite as much as August 2024's line-up, which currently offers 18 LEGO games at an absurdly low price.

Titled "LEGO World Collide: The Ultimate Assembly," this August 2024 Humble Bundle is split into three tiers. The first tier includes five separate LEGO video games, including the first LEGO Batman , LEGO Marvel Superheroes , and LEGO Harry Potter , along with LEGO Lord of the Rings and The LEGO Movie Videogame . Fans can buy these games for a minimum of just a few dollars.

The second tier costs just a few dollars extra and contains another five LEGO video games, including LEGO Marvel's Avengers , LEGO Batman 2 , and LEGO Harry Potter Years 5-7 . And finally, for just $15, fans can get an eye-watering total of 18 LEGO games, including more recent titles like LEGO Marvel Superheroes 2 , LEGO Batman 3 , LEGO DC Super-Villains , and LEGO Worlds . Each one of these tiers also comes with an 85% off coupon for LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga on the Humble Store.

August 2024's PlayStation Plus Free Games Have Something Big for LEGO Fans

PC gamers don't get to have all the fun this August, however. Those subscribed to PlayStation Plus will now be able to redeem their three free monthly titles. Headlining August's PS Plus line-up is LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga , TT Games' most recent, and most ambitious LEGO title. Fans on both PS4 and PS5 can redeem the game and keep it for as long as they're subscribed to PS Plus.

A Plethora of New LEGO Sets Release This August

LEGO was already set to have an incredibly busy August even without Humble Bundle and PlayStation Plus, as all of its major lines have just received new waves. LEGO's Star Wars , Animal Crossing , Sonic the Hedgehog , Super Mario , Batman , and Marvel lines have all received a handful of new LEGO sets this August, some of which fans have had their eyes on for a while now. LEGO is also releasing its impressive Minecraft Crafting Table set this month.

item.title: Fallout Shelter: All Characters From the Fallout TV Show (& How to Get Them)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Fallout TV Show Dwellers In Fallout Shelter
  • How To Obtain These Characters In Fallout Shelter

Fallout Shelter allows players to experience life as a Vault Overseer, where they can get into the game's lore and create some amazing spaces for their Vault Dwellers. The players get to make the calls, so whatever they want goes. They can design the Vault, invite specific people into the Vault, and they can even figure out which people should work where.

While playing the game, players will notice that a good portion of the Vault Dwellers come from various games (and now the TV show) in the franchise. These Vault Dwellers are known as Legendary Dwellers, and they offer some amazing items and S.P.E.C.I.A.L. stats. Here's a breakdown of all the characters from the Fallout TV show that appear in the game.

All Fallout TV Show Dwellers In Fallout Shelter

Here's a breakdown of each of the characters from the Fallout TV show in the game.

All Other Characters From The Fallout TV Show In Fallout Shelter

There are a few other characters from the show that have made their way into the game. Here's a breakdown of those:

  • CX404 - Pet
  • Rollerbrain - Pet
  • Snip Snip - Mr. Handy

How To Obtain These Characters In Fallout Shelter

Originally, players could obtain these characters by either logging in during a specific time or by completing specific quests during a certain time. If players have missed these opportunities, they can obtain each of these via Lunchboxes. (The pets are obtained via the Pet Carriers, and Snip Snip is available via Mr. Handy boxes.)

It is rare to get a Legendary Dweller from a Lunchbox, so it may take quite a bit before obtaining these characters.

item.title: Roblox: Smashy Hands Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Smashy Hands offers players a survival experience in which they have to hide from a giant, which one of the players plays as. The experience has a huge number of different items and skins that can be purchased for Cash. However, it is quite difficult to earn it, especially during the very first rounds. Instead, you should use Smashy Hands codes.

With these Roblox codes, you can get a lot of cash at the very beginning of the game. However, you should not delay using them for a long time. Each code expires after a certain time and as a result, the rewards are no longer available.

All Smashy Hands Codes

Working Smashy Hands Codes

  • 2.5klikes - Redeem this code to get 2500 Cash
  • 5klikes - Redeem this code to get 2500 Cash
  • 10klikes - Redeem this code to get 5000 Cash

Expired Smashy Hands Codes

  • 1klikes

At first glance, the gameplay of Smashy Hands may seem quite simple. But, in fact, hiding from the giant until the end of the round is extremely difficult, especially considering that they can destroy buildings. To diversify your experience, you can purchase various items for Cash, including cosmetic ones. This is the main in-game currency, which is earned by winning rounds. Fortunately, there is a way to get them much easier, namely with the help of Smashy Hands codes.

Using these codes, you will receive various rewards, including a large amount of Cash. However, it is important to note that the codes are active for a limited time. In other words, if they expire, you will no longer be able to use them to get a reward. Therefore, you should hurry.

How to Redeem Smashy Hands Codes

Just like in most other Roblox games, to use Smashy Hands codes, you just need to make a couple of clicks. However, this can only be done before the start of the round. So, follow these simple steps to get your free goodies:

  • Launch Smashy Hands .
  • Open the Shop by clicking on the corresponding button on the left side of the screen.
  • Then, go to the Passes tab.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Redeem button.
  • If you did everything correctly and the code is still active, you will see a message about receiving the reward.

How to Get More Smashy Hands Codes

To not miss out on new goodies in Smashy Hands , you should use Roblox codes as soon as they are released. Therefore, we recommend you bookmark this article, as we will update it as soon as codes are released. Alternatively, players can visit the developers' social media to get first-hand news:

  • rezrift X page

item.title: Roblox: Project Monster Multiplayer Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Project Monster Multiplayer is one of the survival experiences based on Poppy Playtime . Therefore, in each round, players must fulfill certain conditions to escape from the map. At the same time, several players play the role of monsters hunting others. And to unlock more new characters, grabpacks, and other items, you will need Gems. Fortunately, they can be easily obtained with the help of Project Monster Multiplayer codes.

Each of these codes offers players valuable rewards. And although these are often Gems, their number is quite large. So, just one such code will allow you to unlock any character.

All Project Monster Multiplayer Codes

Working Project Monster Multiplayer Codes

  • JOXTER2024 - Redeem this code to get 3000 Gems

Expired Project Monster Multiplayer Codes

  • MATRA2024
  • SPUNKYMONKEY2024
  • WEWILLNOTGIVEUP

Each round in Project Monster Multiplayer is a real challenge. In addition to the fact that you must know the map and hiding spots, you must also be able to escape from the monsters. And by winning, you can get valuable Gems, which are needed to buy new items and even increase the chance of playing for monsters. But at first, you may find it difficult to earn them. In this case, you should use Project Monster Multiplayer codes.

As we said, these codes are an excellent source of Gems. Just a few of them will allow you to purchase various items even before your first round. However, as always, the codes are active for a limited time. Therefore, you need to hurry to use them before they expire.

How to Redeem Project Monster Multiplayer Codes

Using Project Monster Multiplayer codes is as easy as in other Roblox games. You just need to click a few times to get free goodies. For convenience, we recommend you follow these steps:

  • First, launch Project Monster Multiplayer .
  • If you accidentally closed the Codes window that opens automatically when you start the game, click on the Twitter button in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code and click the Redeem button.
  • If you do everything correctly, a notification about receiving your rewards will appear on the screen.

How to Get More Project Monster Multiplayer Codes

In order not to miss new Roblox codes, you should bookmark this article as we will update it over time. In addition, players can visit the developers' official pages:

  • PROJECT MONSTER X page

item.title: Stardew Valley Player Learns Painful Lesson After Mining Mishap
item.description:
Highlights

  • Stardew Valley players should be cautious in the mines to avoid losing valuable inventory items.
  • Recovery services in the game can help retrieve lost items, but the process is limited to one item only.
  • Bringing only essential items to the mines can prevent significant losses and ensure smoother gameplay.

A Stardew Valley player who went to the mines ended up learning a very painful lesson to not bring more than they need with them. The player shared their misfortune with other Stardew Valley fans who were quick to share both advice and sympathy.

Stardew Valley isn't a hugely punishing game, but there are mistakes that can be made that can significantly impact a player's playthrough. For example, if a Stardew Valley farmer passes out from not making it to bed before 2 am, their farmer will lose energy and may end up paying a fee the next day. However, one fate potentially far worse than this is being defeated in the mines, which sees players losing a chunk of their inventory.

Such is the case for Reddit user Academic-Okra9016, who shared their results from having been defeated in the mines. Their character can be seen recovering in Dr Harvey 's office, with a screen indicating how many items they've lost. Unfortunately, most of what they lost was extremely valuable and/or was in large stacks. In all, they lost an Auto-Petter, Iron Ore, over 100 Life Elixirs, over 500 Triple Shot Espressos, and over 200 Hay. The game estimates the value lost at just under 293,000 gold, but the rarity of the Auto-Petter makes the loss all the more painful.

Stardew Valley Player Learns Harsh Lesson

Fellow Stardew Valley fans were sympathetic, but also chided the player for their choices. As many pointed out, it's never a good idea to enter the mines with more than absolutely necessary due to the risk of losing gear like this. Bringing things like Triple Shot Espresso and Life Elixir makes sense, as one provides a speed boost and the other a significant health recovery. However, there's no real reason to go into the mines carrying hundreds of them. Some questioned why the player would enter the mines with Hay at all, considering there's no use for it there.

There is one bit of hope for the player in that they can recover one of these items. Marlon , who can be found at the Adventurer's Guild, offers a service to retrieve items lost while delving in Stardew Valley 's mines. However, he can only bring back one, and the rest will remain forevermore lost. Most players would recommend bringing back the Auto-Petter, as they're extremely rare drops in the game unless one follows the Joja Route. Some players find Auto-Petters in the mines, so it's possible it was a random drop for this fan.

Players also suggested that the fan simply restart the day to prevent these losses, which is a valid choice. However, if they did find the Auto-Petter on this trip through the mine, it might be better to deal with the loss of inventory items just to get the Auto-Petter. Having one can dramatically speed up routines around farms with animals, as players don't have to interact with their animals daily to improve their happiness. The player hasn't reported back on what they ended up doing, but hopefully they found a solution that main this loss as painless as possible.
